title: Culture: Entertainment (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Entertainment subcategory within Culture. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: There are many cafes in Akihabara in which girls dressed as maids serve customers.
cards.romaji: Akihabara niwa, josei ga meido sugata de sekkyaku o suru kafe ga takusan arimasu.
cards.japanese: 秋葉原には、女性がメイド姿で接客をするカフェがたくさんあります。
